scripts.deploy: npm run publish & npm run build
scripts.deploy:zip: npm run build:lib && npm run build:zip && node ./deploy
scripts.build:lib: npm run build-component-lib &&  npm run build-component-modules && npm run build-component-charts && npm run build-component-js && npm run build-component-iconfont && npm run build-component-theme
scripts.build-component-lib: vue-cli-service build --dest dist/tong-zui-ui --name index ./src/components/TongComponents/index.js --no-clean --target lib  --mode component && cd dist/tong-zui-ui && rename index.umd.js index.js
scripts.build-component-modules: vue-cli-service build --dest dist/tong-zui-ui/modules --name index ./src/components/TongComponents/modules/index.js --no-clean --target lib  --mode component && cd dist/tong-zui-ui/modules && rename index.umd.js index.js
scripts.build-component-charts: vue-cli-service build --dest dist/tong-zui-ui/charts --name index ./src/components/TongComponents/charts/index.js --no-clean --target lib  --mode component && cd dist/tong-zui-ui/charts && rename index.umd.js index.js
scripts.build-component-js: mkdir dist\tong-zui-ui\js && copy D:\编程项目\2020\组件库\tongcomps\src\components\TongComponents\js\* D:\编程项目\2020\组件库\tongcomps\dist\tong-zui-ui\js
scripts.build-component-iconfont: mkdir dist\tong-zui-ui\iconfont && copy D:\编程项目\2020\组件库\tongcomps\src\components\TongComponents\iconfont\* D:\编程项目\2020\组件库\tongcomps\dist\tong-zui-ui\iconfont
scripts.build-component-theme: mkdir dist\tong-zui-ui\theme && copy D:\编程项目\2020\组件库\tongcomps\src\components\TongComponents\theme\* D:\编程项目\2020\组件库\tongcomps\dist\tong-zui-ui\theme
scripts.publish: npm run create:tag && cd ./src/components/TongComponents && npm publish --registry http://10.10.87.68:8081/repository/npm-local/
